ModMetaData.name: Display Cases (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Cali
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of Calis mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1134779211
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/DisplayCases][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img]
Adds display cases for showcasing legendary items.
Legendary items actually have negative beauty in-game, this mod hides that negative beauty and the display case itself adds beauty of it's own. Find them in the 'furniture' tab.
[url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/wgfy19wlz7xr21l/DisplayCases_0.3.zip?dl=0]Dropbox[/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
